fields.name: Increase Sales
fields.description: The primary focus is to boost revenue through customer acquisition.

fields.name: Generate Leads
fields.description: Goal is to collect quality leads for the sales team to close.

fields.name: Brand Awareness
fields.description: Increase the visibility and impact of the brand.
fields.suggested_channels: Social Media, Content Marketing, Public Relations

fields.name: Improve Customer Retention
fields.description: Increase customer loyalty and decrease churn rate.
fields.suggested_channels: Email Marketing, Customer Service, Social Media

fields.name: Launch New Product or Service
fields.description: Introduce a new product or service to the market.

fields.name: Build Thought Leadership
fields.description: Establish the brand or key people as experts in the field.
fields.suggested_channels: Content Marketing, Social Media, Speaking Engagements

fields.name: Enhance Customer Engagement
fields.description: Increase customer involvement and interaction with the brand.
fields.suggested_channels: Social Media, Content Marketing, Community Building
